articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Nord Stream pipeline gas leaks labelled an 'act of sabotage' by Poland's prime minister - ABC News
articles.description: Unexplained leaks have been detected by Denmark and Sweden in the two Nord Stream pipelines, which have been a focus of tension after Russia cut supplies to Europe.
articles.content:
The two Nord Stream gas pipelines linking Russia and Europe have been hit by unexplained leaks, raising suspicions of sabotage.
Key points:
<ul><li>The pipelines owned by Russian gas giant Gazprom … [+3906 chars]
